title: Ticket #2651: UdpWakeOnLanWaker mishandles subnets of length 15
description:
condor_power fails to wake up a machine with a subnet mask that is 15 characters long. Lukas Slebodnik noted that the following code in UdpWakeOnLanWaker::UdpWakeOnLanWaker is responsible: 

   found = ad->LookupString (
        ATTR_SUBNET_MASK,
        m_subnet,
        MAX_IP_ADDRESS_LENGTH-1 );
